column4: Sorry for the offtopic-question:  Is there anyone from the USA ?  I am going to fly to the USA in the next time,  and the cheapest destination is Orlando.  So I try to find a VERY cheap way to travel from Orlando to Los Angeles (maybe by Bus or train?)  what is the cheapest way?
the bus would be the cheapest
if you can make advanced arrangements, you might get a flight cheaper, but that takes some planning
how can I find out how much such a bus ticket costs, please?
